name.baseName: Finishing ; Silk, printed and dyed silk fabric ; Silk fabric ; Chemical finishing-setting ; All sizes; NESPS2
整理 ; 蚕丝、印染丝织物 ; 丝织物 ; 化学整理-定型 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Suspended solids, unspecifiedisSpray tower/water shock bath + electrostatic precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management53.44，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Suspended solids, unspecifiedisSpray tower/water shock bath + electrostatic precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management53.44，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
technology.technologicalApplicability: 此工艺描述的是丝织品的整理过程，包括所有尺寸的印染丝织物的化学处理和定型。它常用于纺织制造，以提高丝绸服装和产品的质量和特性。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码17,三级代码174.0,四级代码1743文件，在完整版文件中第258页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为蚕丝、印染丝织物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Suspended solids, unspecifiedisSpray tower/water shock bath + electrostatic precipitation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management53.44，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours) / normal production time (hours)
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是喷淋塔/冲击水浴+静电除尘，其效率为53.44，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=工艺废气净化装置耗电量/(工艺废气净化装置额定功率×工艺废气净化装置运行时间)。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
